highlights.description: Initial release: Read-only MCP server for Google Slides presentations

added.description: `get_presentation` tool: retrieve presentation metadata (title, slide count, locale, revision)
`list_slides` tool: enumerate slides with titles and element counts
`get_slide` tool: get content and elements for a specific slide by index or object ID
`get_slide_notes` tool: get speaker notes for a specific slide
`get_presentation_content` tool: aggregate all slides' text and images in one call
Google service account authentication via `-credentials` flag
goauth CredentialsSet authentication via `-goauth-credentials-file` and `-goauth-credentials-account` flags

documentation.description: README with installation, authentication setup, and Claude Desktop configuration

infrastructure.description: GitHub Actions CI workflow for build and test
Dependabot configuration for Go modules and Actions
